title: (x) TrendyWeb.omgheadshot.com - Yanone Kaffeesatz {Marc O}
content:
Hi, I've come across this font online and it looks very familiar, but I can't quite put my finger on just what font it is. I'm pretty sure I've seen it somewhere before. This sample is from a humorous look at the look of Web2.0 sites. All in good fun.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [title.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122306/http:/typophile.com/files/title.png) | 14.45 KB |
author: celfyddwr

comments.content: Hehehe, looks like a playful take on [FF Dax Compact Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122306/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11416.4.13&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=TrendyWeb.omgheadshot.com&sampleSize=48).

An apt description, Yves. It's Yanone Kaffeesatz, the charming freeware font available here:

[http://www.yanone.de/schriftgestaltung/kaffeesatz/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122306/http:/www.yanone.de/schriftgestaltung/kaffeesatz/ "http://www.yanone.de/schriftgestaltung/kaffeesatz/")

And discussed here:

[http://typographi.com/001045.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122306/http:/typographi.com/001045.php "http://typographi.com/001045.php")
Awesome. Thank you to both of you. :)
